text: The Wicked Carabel (Spanish: El malvado Carabel) is a comedy novel by Wenceslao Fernández Flórez that has been adapted to film three times: *El malvado Carabel, 1935 film by Edgar Neville *El malvado Carabel, 1956 film by Fernando Fernán Gómez. *El malvado Carabel, 1962 film by Rafael Baledón.
title: The Wicked Carabel (disambiguation)
